name: Marguerite ZAPERACH, Appellant, v. Troy LEHMAN

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Marguerite ZAPERACH, Appellant, v. Troy LEHMAN.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph M. Olimpi, Zenford A. Mitchell, Aiiquippa, for Marguerite Zaperach.
John L. Walker, Jr., Beaver, for Troy Lehman.
casebody.head_matter:
707 A.2d 511
Marguerite ZAPERACH, Appellant, v. Troy LEHMAN.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 10, 1998.
Decided April 3, 1998.
Joseph M. Olimpi, Zenford A. Mitchell, Aiiquippa, for Marguerite Zaperach.
John L. Walker, Jr., Beaver, for Troy Lehman.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
